name: Lucky Inc.
description:
You work on a company responsible for giving both good and back luck to every people in the world. Your job is to evaluate each person so that you decide what kind of luck you should give.

HOW TO PLAY

To evaluate each person, look at their intentions and objective. Draw your conclusions and decide wisely. For giving luck, click on the corresponding button. But be careful: if you give good luck to someone with bad intentions or bad luck to someone with good intentions, you will be penalized. At the end of your shift, you will be able to see how many people you have rated, how many times you have had good and bad luck and an overall assessment of your day. Try to evaluate as many people as possible over time to make the most of your day. Good luck!

(pun definitely intended)
